description: Mardu is the title of the official newsletter of Beth Mardutho. After a hiatus of several years, Mardu is back with an all new issue. This newsletter keeps readers informed of news about Beth Mardutho and upcoming projects. Mardu 1 (September 2001) Mardu 2 (December 2001) Mardu 3 (March 2002) Mardu 4 (June 2002) Mardu 5 (December 2002) Mardu 6 (March 2003) Mardu 7 (July 2011) Mardu 8 (November 2011)
